languages.text: "Оружие?" {n}Голос старика звучит испуганно и жалостливо. {/n} "Откуда бы подобное взялось в нашем-то захудалом отсеке?"

traits.locale_text: "Оружие?" {n}Голос старика звучит испуганно и жалостливо. {/n} "Откуда бы подобное взялось в нашем-то захудалом отсеке?"

languages.text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"
languages.original_text: "Оружие?" {n}Голос старика звучит испуганно и жалостливо. {/n} "Откуда бы подобное взялось в нашем-то захудалом отсеке?"

"Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"

languages.text: “武器？”{n}老人的声音听起来既恐惧、又可怜。{/n}“像那样的东西，怎么会出现在底层甲板上呢？”
languages.original_text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"

traits.locale_text: “武器？”{n}老人的声音听起来既恐惧、又可怜。{/n}“像那样的东西，怎么会出现在底层甲板上呢？”

languages.text: «¿Armas?». {n}El anciano habla con voz temblorosa por el miedo.{/n} «¿Cómo iba a acabar una cosa así en este compartimento que parece una sentina?».
languages.original_text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Armas?». {n}El anciano habla con voz temblorosa por el miedo.{/n} «¿Cómo iba a acabar una cosa así en este compartimento que parece una sentina?».

languages.text: 「武器？」{n}老人の声は、怯えていて哀れだった。{/n}「そんなものが、どうしてうちの一番下の区画にあるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"

traits.locale_text: 「武器？」{n}老人の声は、怯えていて哀れだった。{/n}「そんなものが、どうしてうちの一番下の区画にあるんだ？」

languages.text: "Waffen?" {n}Die Stimme des alten Mannes klingt ängstlich und mitleiderregend.{/n} "Wie sollte so etwas in unser gottvergessenes Modul gelangen?"
languages.original_text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"

traits.locale_text: "Waffen?" {n}Die Stimme des alten Mannes klingt ängstlich und mitleiderregend.{/n} "Wie sollte so etwas in unser gottvergessenes Modul gelangen?"

languages.text: « Des armes, dans notre compartiment de fond de cale ? {n}rétorque le vieil homme d'une voix faible et apeurée.{/n} Comment auraient-elles bien pu atterrir ici ? »
languages.original_text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"

traits.locale_text: « Des armes, dans notre compartiment de fond de cale ? {n}rétorque le vieil homme d'une voix faible et apeurée.{/n} Comment auraient-elles bien pu atterrir ici ? »

languages.text: "Silahlar mı?" {n}İhtiyar adamın sesi, kulağa korku dolu ve acıklı geliyor.{/n} "Öyle bir şey, güvertenin en dibindeki kompartımanımızı nasıl boylayabilir?"
languages.original_text: "Weapons?" {n}The old man's voice sounds frightened and pitiful.{/n} "How would something like that wind up in our bottom-of-the-bilge compartment?"
